import React, {useState} from "react"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import brand from "../../../../Assets/img/brand.png"; import {IProduct} from "../../Models/IProduct"; interface IProps{ } interface IState { product : IProduct } let UploadProduct : React.FC = () => { let [productState , setProductState] = useState({ product : {} as IProduct }) let UpdateInput = (event : React.ChangeEvent) => { setProductState({ ...productState, [event.target.name] : event.target.value }) } return(
